#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long int
#define s(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
using namespace std;
ll arr[100005];
int main()
{
	ll t;
	s(t);
	while(t--)
	{
		ll n, i,odd = 0, even = 0;
		s(n);
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			s(arr[i]);
			if((arr[i]&1) == 1)
			  odd++;
			else 
			  even++;
		}
		ll ans = (n * (n-1))/2 - (odd*(odd-1))/2;
		printf("%lld\n", ans);
	}
}
